name: simpggrpd

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SimpGrp → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(c0, cgrp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SimpGrp → c0 ∈ Grp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))

comment: A simple group is a group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
